questions.question: This security device monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic based on predetermined security rules.
This type of firewall filters traffic based on the source and destination IP addresses, ports, and protocols.
This type of firewall inspects the state of active connections and makes decisions based on the context of the traffic.
This term refers to a firewall that combines multiple security functions, such as intrusion prevention and antivirus, into a single device.
This type of firewall is implemented in software and runs on a general-purpose operating system.
